properties.name: srobber.manager.phone.aliyun.access-key-id
properties.description: 阿里云账号(可以是RAM授权子帐号)

properties.name: srobber.manager.oss.aliyun.access-key-secret
properties.description: 阿里云账号(可以是RAM授权子帐号)

properties.name: srobber.manager.phone.shanyan.encrypt-type
properties.description: 创蓝闪验加解密类型0-AES 1-RSA(非必填, 默认0)

properties.name: srobber.manager.phone.shanyan.private-key
properties.description: 创蓝闪验类型1-RSA对应私钥(非必填)
